trans-unit.source: Represents a field that is displayed as an image in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et felt som vises som et bilde i en databundet-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The ImageField class is used by data-bound controls (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>) to display an image for each record displayed.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ImageField brukes av databundet kontroller (eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>) til å vise et bilde for hver post vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The ImageField object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used.
trans-unit.target: Objektet ImageField vises forskjellig avhengig databundet kontrollen den brukes.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays an ImageField object as a column, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control displays it as a row.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen viser en ImageField-objektet som en kolonne, mens den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen viser som en rad.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To display images, you must bind an ImageField object to a field from a data source that contains the URL of an image.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil vise bilder, må du binde et ImageField-objekt til et felt fra en datakilde som inneholder URL-adressen til et bilde.

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjøres ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URL value can be formatted by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: URL-verdien kan formatere ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each image can also have alternate text associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Hver bilde kan også ha alternativ tekst som er knyttet til den.

trans-unit.source: This text is displayed when an image cannot be loaded, or is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Denne teksten vises når et bilde ikke kan lastes eller er utilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: Browsers that support the ToolTips feature also display this text as a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: Nettlesere som støtter funksjonen verktøytips Vis også teksten som et verktøytips.

trans-unit.source: You can specify the alternate text for a displayed image by using one of the following methods: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A> property to specify alternate text that applies to all images.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi alternativ tekst for viste bildet ved hjelp av følgende metoder:-Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A>til å angi alternativ tekst som gjelder for alle bilder.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A> property to bind a field from a data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> property of each image.
trans-unit.target: -Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A>til å binde et felt fra en datakilde for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>for hvert bilde.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to have different alternate text for each image displayed.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du har forskjellige alternativ tekst for hvert bilde vises.

trans-unit.source: When binding data, you can optionally format the alternate text by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når binding dataene, kan du eventuelt formatere alternativ tekst ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextFormatString%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the URL value for an image is `null`, an image cannot be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Når URL-verdien for et bilde er `null`, kan ikke vise et bilde.

trans-unit.source: You can display an alternate image for `null` field values by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan vise det alternative bildet for `null` feltet verdier ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of an alternate image, you can display alternate text by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for et alternativ bilde, kan du vise alternativ tekst ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, all declared fields are displayed in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Som standard vises alle deklarerte felt i en databundet-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: You can hide an ImageField object in a data-bound control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan skjule et ImageField objekt i en databundet-kontroll ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can customize the header and footer sections of an ImageField object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilpasse topp- og bunntekst delene av et ImageField-objekt.

trans-unit.source: To display a caption in the header or footer section, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: For å vise en tekst i topp-eller bunnteksten, angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>

trans-unit.source: To display an image in the header section instead of text, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil vise et bilde i toppteksten i stedet for tekst, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The header section can be hidden in the ImageField object by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Toppteksten kan skjules i ImageField-objektet ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Some data-bound controls (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Noen databundet kontroller (slik som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen) kan vise eller skjule bare delen hele topp kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: These data-bound controls do not support the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A> property for an individual data-bound field.
trans-unit.target: Disse databundet kontroller støtter ikke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>egenskapen for et enkelt databindingselementer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control, use the control's `ShowHeader` property (if available).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil vise eller skjule delen hele overskrift for en databundet kontroll, Bruk kontrollens `ShowHeader` egenskapen (hvis tilgjengelig).

trans-unit.source: You also can customize the appearance of the ImageField object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også tilpasse utseendet til ImageField objektet (skriftfarge bakgrunnsfarge og så videre) ved å angi stilegenskaper for de ulike delene av feltet.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different style properties.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser egenskapene annen stil.

trans-unit.source: |Style property|Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>|The style settings for the child Web server controls of the ImageField object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A>|The style settings for the footer section of the ImageField object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderStyle%2A>|The style settings for the header section of the ImageField object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A>|The style settings for the data items in the ImageField object.|
trans-unit.target: | Style-egenskapen | Beskrivelse | |--------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for de underordnede server webkontroller for ImageField-objektet. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for bunnteksten for ImageField-objektet. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for delen topptekst for ImageField-objektet. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for dataelementer i ImageField-objektet. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren brukes vanligvis når du legger til felt til en dynamisk opprettet databundet-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: To dynamically add an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object to a data-bound control, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection.
trans-unit.target: Dynamisk legge til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objekt til en databundet kontroll, Opprett en ny <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objekt, angi egenskapene og deretter legge den til databindingselementer kontrollens feltet samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker for eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>styre, legge til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objekt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Selv om dynamisk kan du legge til felt i en databundet, det anbefales at feltene statisk deklarert og deretter vises eller skjules, etter behov.

trans-unit.source: Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Statisk deklarerer alle felt reduserer størrelsen på visningsstatusen for den overordnede databundet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alternate text displayed for an image in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den alternative teksten vises for et bilde i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use the AlternateText property to specify the alternate text for the images displayed in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen AlternateText til å angi alternativ tekst for bilder vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: The alternate text is displayed when an image cannot be loaded or is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Den alternative teksten vises når et bilde ikke kan lastes eller er utilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: Browsers that support the ToolTips feature also display this text as a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: Nettlesere som støtter funksjonen verktøytips Vis også teksten som et verktøytips.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When this property is set, all images displayed in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object share the same alternate text.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når denne egenskapen er angitt, alle bilder vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>deler samme alternativ tekst for objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can bind the alternate text to a field in a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan binde alternativ tekst som et alternativ til et felt i en datakilde ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A>egenskapen i stedet for denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to have different alternate text for each image displayed.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du har forskjellige alternativ tekst for hvert bilde vises.

trans-unit.source: If both the AlternateText and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Hvis begge AlternateText og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A>egenskapene er angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A>egenskapen prioriteres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The alternate text for an image displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Alternativ tekst for et bilde som vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether empty string ("") values are converted to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> when the field values are returned from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om tom streng ("") konverteres til <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> når feltverdiene returneres fra datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the user may enter an empty string for a field value when updating or inserting records.
trans-unit.target: Noen ganger kan brukeren angi en tom streng for verdi for feltet når du oppdaterer eller setter inn poster.

trans-unit.source: Use the ConvertEmptyStringToNull property to specify whether an empty string value is automatically converted to `null` when the data field is updated in the data source > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> class displays `null` as empty strings by default.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ConvertEmptyStringToNull-egenskapen til å angi om en tom streng som er automatisk konverteres til `null` når oppdateres data-feltet i datakilden > [!NOTE] > den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>klasse viser `null` som tomme strenger som standard.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: To display a different value, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å vise en annen verdi, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.String.Empty> values should be converted to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref:System.String.Empty>verdier som skal konverteres til <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"></xref> object to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Overfører egenskaper for gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"> </xref> -objekt til det angitte objektet.

trans-unit.source: The CopyProperties method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A> method to copy the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object to another.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CopyProperties kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A>metode for å kopiere egenskaper for gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objekt til et annet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>-derived object that receives the copy.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref>-avledet objektet som mottar kopien.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The CreateField method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A> method to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateField kalles med <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A>metoden til å opprette en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: En ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source that contains the values to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText*> property of each image in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på feltet fra datakilden som inneholder verdiene som skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText*>for hver bilde i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"> </xref> objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText*>

trans-unit.source: Use the DataAlternateTextField property to specify the name of the filed from the data source that contains the values to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> property of each image in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DataAlternateTextField-egenskapen til å angi navnet på feltet kopieres fra datakilden som inneholder verdiene som skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>for hver bilde i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The enables you to have different alternate text for each image displayed.
trans-unit.target: De gjør at du har forskjellige alternativ tekst for hvert bilde vises.

trans-unit.source: The alternate text is displayed when an image cannot be loaded or is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Den alternative teksten vises når et bilde ikke kan lastes eller er utilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: Browsers that support the ToolTips feature also display this text as a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: Nettlesere som støtter funksjonen verktøytips Vis også teksten som et verktøytips.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can specify alternate text that applies to all images by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kan du angi alternativ tekst som gjelder for alle bilder ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A>egenskapen i stedet for denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A> and DataAlternateTextField properties are set, the DataAlternateTextField field takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Hvis både den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A>og DataAlternateTextField egenskapene er angitt, prioriteres feltet DataAlternateTextField.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText*> property of each image in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på feltet skal bindes den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText*>for hver bilde i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"> </xref> objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that specifies the format in which the alternate text for each image in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"></xref> object is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir strengen som angir formatet som alternativ tekst for hver bilde i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"> </xref> objektet gjengis.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataAlternateTextFormatString property to specify a custom format for the alternate text values of the images displayed in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DataAlternateTextFormatString-egenskapen til å angi et egendefinert format for alternativ tekstverdiene av bilder som vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The format string is applied only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Formatstrengen som brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A>-egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is not applied when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Det er ikke brukes når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A>-egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you need to modify the original value contained in the field.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når du trenger å endre den opprinnelige verdien i feltet.

trans-unit.source: If the DataAlternateTextFormatString property is not set, the alternate text values do not get any special formatting.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen DataAlternateTextFormatString ikke er angitt, får ikke alternative tekstverdiene formatering.

trans-unit.source: The format string can be any literal string and usually contains a placeholder for the field's value.
trans-unit.target: Formatstrengen som kan være en strenglitteral og inneholder vanligvis en plassholder for feltverdien.

trans-unit.source: For example, in the format string "Item Value: {0}", the "{0}" placeholder is replaced with the value of the fields specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel i Formatstrengen "elementverdien: {0}", "{0}"-plassholder erstattes med verdien for feltene som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text.
trans-unit.target: Resten av Formatstrengen vises som litteral tekst.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the format string does not include a placeholder, the field's value from the data source is not included in the final display text.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis Formatstrengen som ikke inneholder en plassholder, feltverdien fra datakilden er ikke inkludert i den endelige teksten.

trans-unit.source: The placeholder consists of two parts separated by a colon (":") and wrapped in braces ("{}"), in the form `{A:Bxx}`.
trans-unit.target: Plassholderen består av to deler atskilt med et kolon (":") og omsluttet av klammeparenteser ("{}"), i formatet `{A:Bxx}`.

trans-unit.source: The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the field value's index in a zero-based list of parameters.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for før kolon (`A` i eksemplet generelle) angir feltet verdiindeksen i en nullbasert liste over parametere.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This parameter is part of the formatting syntax.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne parameteren er en del av syntaksen formatering.

trans-unit.source: Because there is only one field value in each cell, this value can only be set to 0.
trans-unit.target: Fordi det er bare én feltverdien i hver celle, kan bare denne verdien settes til 0.

trans-unit.source: The colon and the values after the colon are optional.
trans-unit.target: Kolon og verdiene etter kolon er valgfrie.

trans-unit.source: The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format in which to display the value.
trans-unit.target: Tegnet etter kolon (`B` i eksemplet generelle) angir formatet som du vil vise verdien.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the common formats.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser vanlige formater.

trans-unit.source: |Format character|Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > The format characters are not case sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified.
trans-unit.target: | Formater tegnet | Beskrivelse | |----------------------|-----------------| | `C`| Viser numeriske verdier i valutaformat. | | `D`| Viser numeriske verdier i desimalformat. | | `E`| Viser numeriske verdier i eksponentielt format (eksponentiell). | | `F`| Viser numeriske verdier i fast format. | | `G`| Viser numeriske verdier i formatet. | | `N`| Viser numeriske verdier i tallformat. | | `X`| Viser numeriske verdier i heksadesimalt format. | > [!NOTE] > Format-tegn er bokstaver, bortsett fra for `X`, som viser heksadesimale tegn i tilfelle angitt.

trans-unit.source: The value after the format character (xx in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display.
trans-unit.target: Verdien etter formattegn (xx i eksemplet generelle) angir antall signifikante sifre eller desimaler som vises.

trans-unit.source: For example, the format string "{0:F2}" displays a fixed-point number with 2 decimal places.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel viser Formatstrengen "{0: F2}" et faste punkt tall med 2 desimaler.

trans-unit.source: For more information on formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om formatering, se [formateringstyper](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the format in which the alternate text for each image in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"></xref> object is rendered.
trans-unit.target: En streng som angir formatet som alternativ tekst for hver bilde i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"> </xref> objektet gjengis.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that now special formatting is applied to the alternate text.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at nå spesiell formatering brukes på den alternative teksten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source that contains the values to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl*> property of each image in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på feltet fra datakilden som inneholder verdiene som skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl*>for hver bilde i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"> </xref> objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl*>

trans-unit.source: Use the DataImageUrlField property to specify the name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> property of each image in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DataImageUrlField-egenskapen til å angi navnet på feltet skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>for hver bilde i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The specified field must contain the URLs for the images to display in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: Det angitte feltet må inneholde URL-adressene for bildene skal vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: You can optionally format the URL values by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan eventuelt formatere URL-verdier ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the filed value is `null`, an image cannot be displayed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når arkiverte verdien er `null`, kan ikke vise et bilde.

trans-unit.source: You can display an alternate image for `null` field values by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan vise det alternative bildet for `null` feltet verdier ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of an alternate image, you can display alternate text by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for et alternativ bilde, kan du vise alternativ tekst ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl*> property of each image in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på feltet skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl*>for hver bilde i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"> </xref> objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that specifies the format in which the URL for each image in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"></xref> object is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir strengen som angir formatet som URL-adressen for hver avbildning i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"> </xref> objektet gjengis.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataImageUrlFormatString property to specify a custom format for the URLs of the images displayed in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DataImageUrlFormatString-egenskapen til å angi et egendefinert format for URL-adresser på bilder som vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you need to generate a URL, such as when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object simply contains the file name.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når du trenger å generere en URL-adresse, for eksempel når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objektet inneholder ganske enkelt filnavnet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: If the DataImageUrlFormatString property is not set, the URL values do not get any special formatting.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen DataImageUrlFormatString ikke er angitt, får ikke URL-adressen verdiene formatering.

trans-unit.source: The format string can be any literal string and usually contains a placeholder for the field's value.
trans-unit.target: Formatstrengen som kan være en strenglitteral og inneholder vanligvis en plassholder for feltverdien.

trans-unit.source: For example, in the format string "Item Value: {0}", the "{0}" placeholder is replaced with the value of the fields specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel i Formatstrengen "elementverdien: {0}", "{0}"-plassholder erstattes med verdien for feltene som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text.
trans-unit.target: Resten av Formatstrengen vises som litteral tekst.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the format string does not include a placeholder, the field's value from the data source is not included in the final display text.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis Formatstrengen som ikke inneholder en plassholder, feltverdien fra datakilden er ikke inkludert i den endelige teksten.

trans-unit.target: Plassholderen består av to deler atskilt med et kolon (":") og omsluttet av klammeparenteser ("{}"), i formatet `{A:Bxx}`.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This parameter is part of the formatting syntax.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne parameteren er en del av syntaksen formatering.

trans-unit.source: Because there is only one field value in each cell, this value can only be set to 0.
trans-unit.target: Fordi det er bare én feltverdien i hver celle, kan bare denne verdien settes til 0.

trans-unit.source: The colon and the values after the colon are optional.
trans-unit.target: Kolon og verdiene etter kolon er valgfrie.

trans-unit.target: Tegnet etter kolon (`B` i eksemplet generelle) angir formatet som du vil vise verdien.

trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om formatering, se [formateringstyper](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the format in which the URL for each image in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"></xref> object is rendered.
trans-unit.target: En streng som angir formatet som URL-adressen for hver avbildning i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"> </xref> objektet gjengis.

trans-unit.source: The default is the empty string ("") , which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the URLs.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at ingen spesielle formateringen til URL-adresser.

trans-unit.source: Fills the specified <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> object with the values from the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fyller den angitte <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> objektet med verdiene fra den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The ExtractValuesFromCell method is a helper method used to retrieve the values of the fields from the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> object in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ExtractValuesFromCell er helper metode som brukes til å hente verdier for feltene fra den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>objekt i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: This method does not have a return value.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden har ikke en returverdi.

trans-unit.source: Instead, the field values are returned by reference through the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object passed in for the `dictionary` parameter.
trans-unit.target: I stedet feltverdiene returneres av referansen via den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>objekt sendt for den `dictionary` parameteren.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: After the method has been called, iterate through the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object to access the field values.
trans-unit.target: Etter at den har blitt kalt, gå gjennom den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>objekt for å få tilgang til feltverdiene.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To include the read-only field values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> object, pass in `true` for the `includeReadOnly` parameter.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Inkludere skrivebeskyttet feltverdiene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>objekt, sendes i `true` for den `includeReadOnly` parameteren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> used to store the values of the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> brukes til å lagre verdiene i den angitte cellen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref> that contains the values to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"> </xref> som inneholder verdiene du vil hente.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the values of read-only fields; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å ta med verdier skrivebeskyttet feltene. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Applies the format specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString*> property to a field value.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder formatet som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString*>til en feltverdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString*>

trans-unit.source: The FormatImageUrlValue method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> class to apply the format specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A> property to a field value.
trans-unit.target: Metoden FormatImageUrlValue er helper metode som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>klassen for å bruke formatet som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A>til en feltverdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: The value to transform.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som transformeringen.

trans-unit.source: The transformed value.
trans-unit.target: Den transformerte verdien.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value used for a field's value when rendering the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"></xref> object in a designer.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien brukt for en feltverdien ved gjengivelse av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"> </xref> objekt i en designer.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeValue method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> class to determine what value to display for a field when rendering an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object in a designer.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetDesignTimeValue er helper metode som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>klassen for å finne ut hva verdien skal vises for et felt ved gjengivelse av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objekt i en designer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: If real data cannot be retrieved from the data source at design time, the value returned by this method is displayed instead.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke kan hente reelle data fra datakilden på utformingstidspunktet, vises verdien som returneres av denne metoden i stedet.

trans-unit.source: The value to display in the designer as the field's value.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som skal vises i designer som feltverdien.

trans-unit.source: Applies the format specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextFormatString*> property to the alternate text value contained in the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder formatet som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextFormatString*>til alternativ tekst-verdi i den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref> objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextFormatString*>

trans-unit.source: The GetFormattedAlternateText method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> class to apply the format specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A> property to the alternate text value.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetFormattedAlternateText er helper metode som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>klassen for å bruke formatet som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A>egenskapen alternative tekstverdien.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: The alternate text value is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> object specified by the `controlContainer` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Alternativ tekstverdien ligger i den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>objektet som er angitt av den `controlContainer` parameteren.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> that contains the alternate text value to transform.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref> som inneholder alternative tekstverdien til transformeringen.

trans-unit.source: The transformed value.
trans-unit.target: Den transformerte verdien.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value of the specified field from the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien for det angitte feltet fra den angitte kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The GetValue method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object to determine the value of the specified field.
trans-unit.target: GetValue-metoden er helper metode som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objektet til å bestemme verdien for det angitte feltet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> that contains the field value.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref> som inneholder verdien i feltet.

trans-unit.source: The name of the field for which to retrieve the value.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på feltet som du vil hente verdien.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the properties of the field.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>, ble sendt av referanse, som representerer egenskapene for feltet.

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified field.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for det angitte feltet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method is called by the data control with which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object is associated to perform basic object initialization for instances of the field, before the field is ever added to a field collection.
trans-unit.target: I initialiseringsmetoden kalles av datakontrollen som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objektet som er knyttet til å utføre grunnleggende objektet initialisering for forekomster av feltet før feltet noensinne er lagt til en felt-samling.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: Data controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> call the Initialize method in their `CreateChildControls` methods before other methods such as `CreateRow` are called to create specific rows with data.
trans-unit.target: Data kontroller for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kaller Initialize-metoden i sine `CreateChildControls` metodene før andre metoder som `CreateRow` kalles for å opprette bestemte rader med data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> objects to perform basic initialization for an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: Kall denne metoden når du skriver et egendefinert databundet kontrollere som bruker <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>objekter til å utføre grunnleggende initialisering for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>

trans-unit.source: Implement this method if your <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>-derived type requires any object initialization before it populates <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> objects with data or controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.InitializeCell%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementer denne metoden hvis din <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>-avledet type krever en objekt-initialisering før den fyller ut <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>objekter med data, eller kontroller i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.InitializeCell%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.InitializeCell%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if sorting is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis sortering støttes. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The data control that contains the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Datakontrollen som inneholder den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alltid <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref> object with the specified cell type, row state, and row index.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer angitt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"> </xref> objekt med den angitte cellen typen rad tilstand og radindeks.

trans-unit.source: The InitializeCell method is implemented by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>-derived types to add text and controls to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> object of a data control that uses tables to display a user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitializeCell implementeres av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>-avledede typer for å legge til tekst og kontroller til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>objekt til en kontroll med data som bruker tabeller til å vise brukergrensesnittet (UI).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: These data controls create the complete table structure row-by-row when the control's `CreateChildControls` method is called.
trans-unit.target: Disse Kontroller opprette hele tabellen strukturen rad-av-raden når kontrollens `CreateChildControls` -metoden.

trans-unit.source: The InitializeCell method is called by the `InitializeRow` method of data controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitializeCell kalles av den `InitializeRow` -metoden til kontroller for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> objects to initialize the cells of the table structure with data or controls.
trans-unit.target: Kall denne metoden når du skriver et egendefinert databundet kontrollere som bruker <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>objekter initialisere cellene i tabellstrukturen med data eller kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>

trans-unit.source: Implement this method when you are writing an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>-derived class.
trans-unit.target: Implementer denne metoden når du skriver et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>-avledet klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref> to initialize.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"> </xref> ikke initialisert.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCellType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCellType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for raden.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref> object with the specified row state.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer angitt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"> </xref> objekt med angitt rad-tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The InitializeDataCell method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> class to initialize a cell in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitializeDataCell er helper metode som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>klassen for å initialisere en celle i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref> to initialize.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"> </xref> ikke initialisert.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"></xref> object when the value of the field specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som skal vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"> </xref> objekt når verdien i feltet som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField*>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the field specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A> property is `null`, an image cannot be displayed in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: Når verdien i feltet som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A>egenskapen `null`, et bilde kan ikke vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the NullDisplayText property to specify the text to display in the image's place.
trans-unit.target: Bruk NullDisplayText-egenskapen til å angi teksten som skal vises på bildets sted.

trans-unit.source: The text usually indicates that the normal image is not available or cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: Teksten angir vanligvis at normal bildet er ikke tilgjengelig eller ikke ble funnet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As an alternative, you can display an alternate image when the field value is `null` by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som et alternativ, kan du vise et alternativ bilde når feltverdien `null` ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A>egenskapen i stedet for denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A> and NullDisplayText properties are both set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A> property has precedence.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A>og NullDisplayText er begge egenskapene, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A>egenskapen prioriteres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text to display when the value of a field is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal vises når verdien for et felt er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an alternate image displayed in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"></xref> object when the value of the field specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URL-adressen til en alternativ bildet som vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"> </xref> objekt når verdien i feltet som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField*>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the field specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A> property is `null`, an image cannot be displayed in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: Når verdien i feltet som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A>egenskapen `null`, et bilde kan ikke vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the NullImageUrl property to specify the URL to an alternate image to display.
trans-unit.target: Bruk NullImageUrl-egenskapen til å angi URL-adressen til det alternative bildet skal vises.

trans-unit.source: The alternate image is usually an image that indicates that the normal image is not available or cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: Det alternative bildet er vanligvis et bilde som angir at normal bildet er ikke tilgjengelig eller ikke ble funnet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As an alternative, you can simply display text when the field value is `null` by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som et alternativ, kan du ganske enkelt å vise tekst når feltverdien `null` ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A>egenskapen i stedet for denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the NullImageUrl and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A> properties are both set, the NullImageUrl property has precedence.
trans-unit.target: Hvis NullImageUrl og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A>er begge egenskapene, prioriteres egenskapen NullImageUrl.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URL to an alternate image displayed when the value of a field is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen til en alternativ bildet som vises når verdien for et felt er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Binds the value of a field to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Binding verdien for et felt i <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The OnDataBindField method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> class to bind the value of a field in the data source to a corresponding cell in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: Den OnDataBindField til metoden er en helper brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>klassen for å binde verdien av feltet i datakilden til en tilsvarende celle i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: Kilden for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"></xref> object contains a control that is not a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox"></xref> control in edit mode and is not an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image"></xref> control with a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label"></xref> control in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"> </xref> objektet inneholder en kontroll som ikke er en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox"> </xref> kontrollere i redigeringsmodus, og er ikke en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image"> </xref> styre med en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label"> </xref> kontrollen i skrivebeskyttet modus.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the values of the field specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField*> property can be modified in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om verdiene i feltet som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField*>-egenskapen kan endres i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField*>

trans-unit.source: By default, the values of the field specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A> property can be modified by the user when a data-bound control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Som standard verdiene i feltet som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A>egenskapen kan endres av brukeren med en databundet kontroll i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the user from changing the values of the field, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Sett denne egenskapen til for å hindre at brukeren endrer verdiene i feltet `true`.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A> property usually contains the name of the field that contains the URLs to the images displayed in the object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objektet i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A>egenskapen vanligvis inneholder navnet på feltet som inneholder URL-adressene til bilder vises i objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the field values cannot be modified in edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å angi at feltverdiene ikke kan endres i redigeringsmodus; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Represents the "this" expression.
trans-unit.target: Representerer "this" uttrykket.

trans-unit.source: The ThisExpression field is used to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object should bind to the data source itself rather than a filed of the data source.
trans-unit.target: Feltet ThisExpression brukes til å angi at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objektet skal bindes til datakilden seg selv i stedet for arkiverte for datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value returned by the object's <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method will be displayed in the field.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet verdien som returneres av objektets <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>metoden skal vises i feltet.</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the controls contained in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"></xref> object support callbacks.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om kontrollene finnes i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField"> </xref> objekt støtte tilbakeringinger.

trans-unit.source: The ValidateSupportsCallback method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object support callbacks.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ValidateSupportsCallback er en helper brukes til å bestemme om kontrollene finnes i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>objekt støtte tilbakeringinger.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: This method has been implemented as an empty method (a method that does not contain any code) to indicate that callbacks are supported.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er implementert som en tom metode (en metode som ikke inneholder kode) til å angi at tilbakeringinger støttes.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.
